data.name: Attack Boost
data.description: Increases attack power.

data.name: Agitator
data.description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

data.name: Peak Performance
data.description: Increases attack when your health is full.

data.name: Resentment
data.description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

data.name: Resuscitate
data.description: Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status.

data.name: Critical Eye
data.description: Increases affinity.

data.name: Critical Boost
data.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.
data.lv1: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%.
data.lv2: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%.
data.lv3: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

data.name: Weakness Exploit
data.description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.
data.lv1: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
data.lv2: Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
data.lv3: Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

data.name: Latent Power
data.description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
data.lv1: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
data.lv2: While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
data.lv3: While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
data.lv4: While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
data.lv5: While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

data.name: Maximum Might
data.description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

data.name: Critical Element
data.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

data.name: Master's Touch
data.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
data.lv1: Grants a 20% chance of no sharpness loss while active.
data.lv2: Grants a 40% chance of no sharpness loss while active.
data.lv3: Grants an 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

data.name: Fire Attack
data.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Water Attack
data.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Ice Attack
data.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Thunder Attack
data.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Dragon Attack
data.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Poison Attack
data.description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Paralysis Attack
data.description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Sleep Attack
data.description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Blast Attack
data.description: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Handicraft
data.description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

data.name: Razor Sharp
data.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

data.name: Spare Shot
data.description: Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

data.name: Protective Polish
data.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

data.name: Mind's Eye
data.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.
data.lv1: 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+10% damage to hard targets when activated).
data.lv2: 100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+15% damage to hard targets when activated).
data.lv3: 100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+30% damage to hard targets when activated).

data.name: Ballistics
data.description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

data.name: Bludgeoner
data.description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.
data.lv1: +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
data.lv2: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
data.lv3: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

data.name: Bow Charge Plus
data.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

data.name: Focus
data.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
data.lv1: 5% faster gauge fill rate and 5% faster charge times.
data.lv2: 10% faster gauge fill rate and 10% faster charge times.
data.lv3: 20% faster gauge fill rate and 15% faster charge times.

data.name: Power Prolonger
data.description: Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.
data.lv1: Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
data.lv2: Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
data.lv3: Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

data.name: Marathon Runner
data.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

data.name: Constitution
data.description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

data.name: Stamina Surge
data.description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

data.name: Guard
data.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
data.lv1: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
data.lv2: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
data.lv3: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
data.lv4: Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
data.lv5: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

data.name: Guard Up
data.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

data.name: Offensive Guard
data.description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

data.name: Critical Draw
data.description: Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

data.name: Punishing Draw
data.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)
data.lv1: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +3.
data.lv2: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +5.
data.lv3: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +7.

data.name: Quick Sheathe
data.description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

data.name: Slugger
data.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

data.name: Stamina Thief
data.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

data.name: Affinity Sliding
data.description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

data.name: Horn Maestro
data.description: Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage.

data.name: Artillery
data.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.
data.lv1: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
data.lv2: Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
data.lv3: Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

data.name: Load Shells
data.description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
data.lv1: Increases ammo and coating reloading speed.
data.lv2: Gunlance loading capacity +1 Increases charge blade phials

data.name: Special Ammo Boost
data.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.
data.lv1: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
data.lv2: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

data.name: Normal/Rapid Up
data.description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
data.lv1: Slightly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
data.lv2: Increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
data.lv3: Greatly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

data.name: Pierce Up
data.description: Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
data.lv1: Slightly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
data.lv2: Increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
data.lv3: Greatly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

data.name: Spread Up
data.description: Increases the attack power of Spread Ammo and Spread- type arrows
data.lv1: Slightly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
data.lv2: Increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
data.lv3: Greatly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

data.name: Ammo Up
data.description: Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
data.lv1: Expands clip size for some ammo types.
data.lv2: Expands clip size for many ammo types.
data.lv3: Expands clip size for most ammo types.

data.name: Reload Speed
data.description: Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed.
data.lv2: Bowgun speed +2. Loads bow coating automatically.

data.name: Recoil Down
data.description: Reduces recoil when firing bowgun ammo.

data.name: Steadiness
data.description: Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots.

data.name: Rapid Fire Up
data.description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

data.name: Defense Boost
data.description: Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases.

data.name: Divine Blessing
data.description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
data.lv1: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
data.lv2: While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
data.lv3: While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

data.name: Recovery Up
data.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

data.name: Recovery Speed
data.description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).
data.lv1: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
data.lv2: Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
data.lv3: Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

data.name: Speed Eating
data.description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

data.name: Earplugs
data.description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
data.lv1: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
data.lv3: Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
data.lv4: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.
data.lv5: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars.

data.name: Windproof
data.description: Grants protection against wind pressure.
data.lv2: Negates minor and major wind pressure.
data.lv3: Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure.

data.name: Tremor Resistance
data.description: Grants protection against ground tremors.
data.lv2: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
data.lv3: Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

data.name: Bubbly Dance
data.description: Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted.
data.lv1: Reduces the effects of major bubbleblight.
data.lv2: Reduces major bubbleblight to minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted.
data.lv3: Also inflicts bubbleblight when performing consecutive evasive movement.

data.name: Evade Window
data.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

data.name: Evade Extender
data.description: Increases evade distance.

data.name: Fire Resistance
data.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Water Resistance
data.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Ice Resistance
data.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Thunder Resistance
data.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Dragon Resistance
data.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Blight Resistance
data.description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.
data.lv1: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
data.lv2: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

data.name: Poison Resistance
data.description: Reduces damage while poisoned.
data.lv1: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
data.lv2: Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

data.name: Paralysis Resistance
data.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.
data.lv1: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
data.lv2: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

data.name: Sleep Resistance
data.description: Reduces the duration of sleep.
data.lv1: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
data.lv2: Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

data.name: Stun Resistance
data.description: Reduces stun duration.
data.lv1: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
data.lv2: Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

data.name: Muck Resistance
data.description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow.

data.name: Blast Resistance
data.description: Grants protection against blastblight.
data.lv1: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
data.lv2: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

data.name: Botanist
data.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
data.lv1: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
data.lv2: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
data.lv3: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
data.lv4: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

data.name: Geologist
data.description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.
data.lv1: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
data.lv2: Allows you to gather one extra time from gathering points.
data.lv3: Allows you to gather one extra time from mining outcrops.

data.name: Partbreaker
data.description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of monsters.

data.name: Capture Master
data.description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

data.name: Carving Master
data.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

data.name: Good Luck
data.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

data.name: Speed Sharpening
data.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
data.lv1: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
data.lv2: Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
data.lv3: Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

data.name: Bombardier
data.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

data.name: Mushroomancer
data.description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
data.lv1: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
data.lv2: Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
data.lv3: Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms.

data.name: Item Prolonger
data.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

data.name: Wide-Range
data.description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
data.lv1: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
data.lv2: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
data.lv3: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
data.lv4: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
data.lv5: Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

data.name: Free Meal
data.description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

data.name: Heroics
data.description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
data.lv1: While active, increases defense by 50 points.
data.lv5: While active, attack power +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated.

data.name: Fortify
data.description: Increases your attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can be activated twice.)
data.lv1: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

data.name: Flinch Free
data.description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
data.lv2: Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

data.name: Jump Master
data.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

data.name: Carving Pro
data.description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

data.name: Hunger Resistance
data.description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.
data.lv1: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
data.lv2: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
data.lv3: Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

data.name: Leap of Faith
data.description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

data.name: Diversion
data.description: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

data.name: Master Mounter
data.description: Improves your Wyvern Riding skills.
data.lv1: Makes filling the Riding Gauge easier and increases ease of parrying.

data.name: Chameleos Blessing
data.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Chameleos.
data.lv1: Sometimes increases the effects of Spiribirds.
data.lv2: Also negates minor and major wind pressure.
data.lv3: Also extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

data.name: Kushala Blessing
data.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Kushala Daora.
data.lv3: Also allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

data.name: Teostra Blessing
data.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Teostra.

data.name: Dragonheart
data.description: Draconic energy fills you after losing a certain amount of health. Weapons lose all non-dragon effects.
data.lv1: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 30.
data.lv2: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50.
data.lv3: When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50.
data.lv4: Contract dragonblight when at 70% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +5% attack power.
data.lv5: Contract dragonblight when at 80% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +10% attack power.

data.name: Wirebug Whisperer
data.description: Improves your handling of Wirebugs.
data.lv1: Extends the duration you can keep a Wirebug by 30%.
data.lv3: Also increases passive recovery rate while on the ground.

data.name: Wall Runner
data.description: Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls.
data.lv1: Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running.
data.lv2: Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running.
data.lv3: Also temporarily increases attack power by wall running.

data.name: Counterstrike
data.description: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.

data.name: Rapid Morph
data.description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

data.name: Hellfire Cloak
data.description: Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks after fulfilling certain conditions.
data.lv3: Inflicts hellfireblight when monsters are enraged.
data.lv4: Effect persists for one minute after a monster's rage has subsided.

data.name: Wind Alignment
data.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Wind Serpent Ibushi.

data.name: Thunder Alignment
data.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Thunder Serpent Narwa.

data.name: Stormsoul
data.description: Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same elements.
data.lv4: Also increases level of other skills by +1.
data.lv5: Also increases level of other skills by +1 (stacks with previous bonus).

data.name: Stormsoul
data.description: Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same elements.
data.lv4: Also increases level of other skills by +1.
data.lv5: Also increases level of other skills by +1 (stacks with previous bonus).
